response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its high value to you at $150, I propose we make this transaction even more attractive. For a limited time, you can acquire the product for $140. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a deal that's just shy of its perceived value to you, ensuring you save while I earn a fair profit. Don't miss out on this special offer!", "product_price": 140}
